name: The Genie of Light
description:
You play as a genie who has to traverse a dark dungeon using your light core avoiding traps and looking for an idol. Watch out for ghosts and ghouls that might pursue you, preventing you from leaving. 

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • LMB to grow light
  • RMB to shrink light
  • R to restart level
  • ESC to get your options

Installation:

  • Download TheGenieOfLight.zip
  • Extract the files
  • Run TheGenieOfLight.exe

Don't forget to comment your best times and if you're really sadistic you can try the minimum light or no light genie run (burn out your core before you start moving and do the whole thing in the dark!).
